featured.title: Fine Structure Constant (alpha)
featured.description: Derives 1/alpha = 137 + 4/111 entirely from division algebra dimensions. Sub-ppm accuracy (0.3 ppm) with zero free parameters.

featured.title: Weinberg Angle (tree + one-loop)
featured.description: Tree-level sin^2(theta_W) = 28/121 from democratic bilinear principle, plus one-loop correction structure. 800 ppm tree gap analyzed.

featured.title: Hubble Constant (H_0)
featured.description: Derives H_0 = 337/5 = 67.4 km/s/Mpc from fourth-power prime family. Exact match to Planck 2018 CMB value within measurement uncertainty.

featured.title: Dark Energy Density (Omega_Lambda)
featured.description: Derives Omega_Lambda = 137/200 = 0.685 connecting the fine structure constant to cosmological expansion.

featured.title: Matter Density (Omega_m)
featured.description: Derives Omega_m = 63/200 from Hilbert-Schmidt equipartition with dual-channel counting. 63 dual-role generators out of 200 total contributions.

featured.title: CONJ-A3: Algebraic Independence (pure math)
featured.description: Proves R^4 and R^7 structures cannot coexist in a common norm-multiplicative algebra. Forces n_d^2 + n_c^2 = 137, not (n_d + n_c)^2 = 225. Uses Radon-Hurwitz obstruction.

featured.title: Three Generations of Fermions
featured.description: Three independent mechanisms trace the generation count to dim(Im(H)) = 3. Strongest: Hom(H, R^7) decomposes into exactly 3 quaternionic channels.

featured.title: Schrodinger Equation from Projection
featured.description: Derives the Schrodinger equation, Born rule, and uncertainty principle from dimensional projection of a higher-dimensional wave onto 3D.
featured.formula: H_3D psi = E_3D psi (from separation of variables)

curated.title: Alpha C_2 Coefficient (24/11)
curated.description: Derives the alpha correction coefficient C_2 = 24/11 from composite Grassmannian geometry. Achieves 0.0002 ppm accuracy.

curated.title: Alpha Step 5: Three-Path Convergence
curated.description: Three independent calculation paths (VEV counting, alternating signs, 2D sigma model) converge on the same correction structure.

curated.title: Tree-to-Dressed Classification (16 ratios)
curated.description: Classifies all 16 derived dimensionless ratios into radiative correction bands A/B/C with structural coefficients.

curated.title: Band A Dressed Predictions
curated.description: One-loop corrections for Band A quantities (alpha, Weinberg angle) using framework coefficients.

curated.title: Band B Coefficient Analysis
curated.description: Analyzes intermediate-precision predictions in Band B with effective coupling extraction.

curated.title: Weinberg Coefficient Origin
curated.description: Traces the Weinberg angle tree-level formula sin^2 = n_d*Im_O / n_c^2 = 28/121 to its algebraic roots.

curated.title: Dark Matter Mass Scale
curated.description: Explores six approaches to the dark matter particle mass from crystallization stress, geometric means, and gauge ratios.

curated.title: Yang-Mills Mass Gap Structure
curated.description: Framework structural analysis: b_0(pure SU(3)) = 11 = n_c, glueball mass conjecture m_0++/sqrt(sigma) ~ n_d = 4.

curated.title: Higgs Mass from Coleman-Weinberg
curated.description: pNGB Higgs mass from SO(11)->SO(4)xSO(7) breaking via Coleman-Weinberg potential. 28 Goldstone modes decompose under SM gauge group.

curated.title: Dark Matter Phenomenology
curated.description: Experimental signatures, detection cross-sections, and collider signatures for the framework's dark matter candidate.

curated.title: SO(8) Triality and 28 Decomposition
curated.description: Verifies SO(8) triality structure and the decomposition of 28 = dim(so(8)) into representation-theoretic components.

curated.title: IRA-01 Ratio Consistency
curated.description: Cross-checks consistency of the 4 remaining irreducible assumptions against derived quantities.

curated.title: Neutrino Mass Formula
curated.description: Derives neutrino mass scale from seesaw mechanism with framework parameters.

curated.title: Gravitational Coupling
curated.description: Explores the connection between gravitational coupling G and division algebra dimensions.

curated.title: CMB Acoustic Peak Dynamics
curated.description: Derives acoustic peak spacing from framework cosmological parameters.

curated.title: Alpha CCWZ One-Loop
curated.description: Computes alpha one-loop correction using CCWZ (Callan-Coleman-Wess-Zumino) formalism on the coset SO(11)/[SO(4)xSO(7)].

curated.title: H-Parity Conservation
curated.description: Proves conservation of H-parity quantum number â€” stabilizes dark matter candidate against decay.

curated.title: Tier 1 Numerical Verification
curated.description: Master verification script: checks all 13 Tier 1 (sub-10 ppm) predictions against CODATA 2022 / PDG measurements.

curated.title: Tier 2 Numerical Verification
curated.description: Checks all Tier 2 predictions (10-10,000 ppm) against measured values.
